tha-ap273:1.4_0: for the attainment of the highest goal.
tha-ap273:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap273:3.1_0: These are the eons of the world
tha-ap273:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap273:4.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap273:4.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap273:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Jaṭiya.
tha-ap273:6.1_0: The goldsmith with the seniors and the junior ones.
